name: template-vite-ts
description: A Phaser 3 TypeScript template using Vite.
author: Phaser Studio <support@phaser.io> (https://phaser.io/)

scripts.dev: cross-env VITE_DEV_MODE=true vite --config vite/config.dev.mjs && pnpm run delete-assets
scripts.build: cross-env VITE_DEV_MODE=false vite build --config vite/config.prod.mjs && pnpm run delete-assets
